Report.SQLvalue: SELECT MS.MARITAL_STAT_DESC AS "Marital Status", PRO.PARTNUM AS "Part Number", PREF.NAME AS "Product Name", PREF.SHORT_DESCRIPTION AS "Product Description" FROM WCA.PERIOD P, WCA.PRODUCT AS PRO, WCA.PRODUCT_REF AS PREF, WCA.MARITAL_STAT_REF AS MS, WCA.MEMBER AS M, WCA.FACT_EVENT AS FE WHERE FE.PRODUCT_ID = PRO.PRODUCT_ID AND FE.PRODUCT_ID = PREF.PRODUCT_ID AND M.MEMBER_ID = FE.MEMBER_ID AND M.MARITAL_STATUS_ID = MS.MARITAL_STATUS_ID AND FE.EVENT_TYPE_ID = 2 AND (P.PER_ID = FE.PER_ID and PRO.PRODUCT_ID NOT IN (SELECT COALESCE(INTEGER(PARAM.PARAM_VALUE),-9999) FROM WCA.PARAMETERS PARAM WHERE PARAM.PARAM_TYPE ='PRODUCT_ID_DEFAULT')) AND P.CALENDAR_DATE >= $DB_TIMESTAMP_FUNC({StartDate})$ AND P.CALENDAR_DATE <= $DB_TIMESTAMP_FUNC({EndDate})$ AND PREF.LANGUAGE_ID IN ( SELECT INTEGER (PR.PARAM_VALUE) FROM WCA.PARAMETERS PR WHERE PR.PARAM_TYPE='REPORT_LANGUAGE') AND FE.STORE_ID IN ({storeent_id}) GROUP BY PRO.PARTNUM, PREF.NAME, PREF.SHORT_DESCRIPTION, MS.MARITAL_STAT_DESC ORDER BY {sortBy} {sortOrder}
